Token.Abstract: The RKObjectMappingOperationDataSource class is an implementation of the RKMappingOperationDataSource protocol for use in performing object mappings that target plain old NSObject derived classes (as opposed to NSManagedObject derived persistent entities).

Asks the data source for the target object for an object mapping operation given an NSDictionary representation of the object's properties and the mapping object that will be used to perform the mapping.

Parameter.Name: mappingOperation
Parameter.Abstract: The mapping operation requesting the target object.

Parameter.Name: representation
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary representation of the properties to be mapped onto the retrieved target object.

Parameter.Name: mapping
Parameter.Abstract: The object mapping to be used to perform a mapping from the representation to the target object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A key-value coding compliant object to perform the mapping on to.

Token.Abstract: Asks the data source for the target object for an object mapping operation the mapping object that will be used to perform the mapping.

Parameter.Name: mappingOperation
Parameter.Abstract: The mapping operation requesting the target object.

Parameter.Name: representation
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary representation of the properties to be mapped onto the retrieved target object.

Parameter.Name: mapping
Parameter.Abstract: The object mapping to be used to perform a mapping from the representation to the target object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A key-value coding compliant object to perform the mapping on to.

Token.Abstract: Asks the data source if the mapping operation should collect RKMappingInfo information during the mapping (stored in the mappingInfo property). If not needed, it can be a substantially faster to skip it. The mappingInfo property will be nil if not collected.

Parameter.Name: mappingOperation
Parameter.Abstract: The mapping operation that is querying the data source.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the mapping operation should collect mapping information, else NO.

Token.Abstract: Asks the data source if it should set values for properties without checking that the value has been changed. This method can result in a performance improvement during mapping as the mapping operation will not attempt to assess the change state of the property being mapped.

Parameter.Name: mappingOperation
Parameter.Abstract: The mapping operation that is querying the data source.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the mapping operation should disregard property change status, else NO.
